page.title: 07GUIDES
page.content: Guides started in {1910}. I go to Guides in {Ardleigh}.It is very interesting.We all go on {WEEK} camps to different places. On camp we all have turns to do things.We collect {Water } and {Wood}.And if you {cook} you {MUST get up at 7.00 in the morning. We also go on {Nature {Trails}and have picnics half way through. On camp each night we have a {Midnight Feast.}Mrs.Swinscoe knows, so the next morning we have to work extra hard. In Guides you can become a {Patrol Leader}or a{Seconder If you are a Patrol Leader you have to wear a badge with one line of white on it.You then lead a group.
